title: Bug 18016: Most menu actions should be disabled for customers from repo
description: Bug 18016: Most menu actions should be disabled for customers from repo. But the rest is meaningless and they should be removed.
OB: Currently, menu actions are not disabled for customers from the repo.
EB: Also, the 'convert line delimiters' should be disabled.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Log in as a customer from the repo. 2. Open the menu and observe that menu actions are not disabled. 3. Try to use the 'convert line delimiters' menu action and observe that it is enabled and functional.
